Grand & Toy's Blog

Overview

I designed & coded this blog as an MVP to test the success of aquiring new customers & re-engaging existing ones through a blog providing value added content. The blog targets mostly small business owners, providing them with helpful suggestions & resources to help their business succeed.

The Problem

The need to create a simple, manageable blog to host weekly content pieces that conincide with email & social communication.

The Process

I began the design process with a competitive analysis of other B2B enterprise company's blogs. After consolidating my research, I began sketching my wireframes and referencing my notes:

then created this high-fidelity mockup that I presented to the project manager and a team of front end devs:

Grand & Toy Blog - A prototype made with Adbobe XD

The Solution

In the few months the blog has been active, G&T has seen growth in sales from the content pieces, as well as aquiring new customers.

Visit the blog here.
